name: Aaaarrrrgggghhhh!
description:
A 2D pirate-themed adventure game where the player will have to gather items and gain the trust of pirates while navigating the thin line between necessary and voluntary evil.

This piece of art was made by 5 enthusiastic students with little or no experience with developing video games in 1 semester under the watchful eye of our dear mentor Jarda and Game Development team of Faculty of Mathematics and Physics, Charles University, Prague.
